uk.org.taverna.server.client.connection.params
Class CustomSSLConnectionParams

java.lang.Object
  uk.org.taverna.server.client.connection.params.AbstractConnectionParams
      uk.org.taverna.server.client.connection.params.CustomSSLConnectionParams
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionParams, ConnectionPNames
public final class CustomSSLConnectionParams
extends AbstractConnectionParams

This class provides easy configuration of an SSL connection to a Taverna Server. Peer verification can be toggled and a client certificate can be provided for authentication to servers with non-standard, or self-signed, certificates.

Author:
Robert Haines

Constructor Detail

CustomSSLConnectionParams

public CustomSSLConnectionParams(java.io.InputStream certificate,
                                 boolean noVerify)
                          throws java.security.cert.CertificateException
Create a custom SSL configuration with a client certificate and optional peer verification.

Parameters:
certificate - the client certificate as an InputStream.
noVerify - switch to turn off peer verification.
Throws:
java.security.cert.CertificateException - if there is a problem with the provided certificate.

                          throws java.security.cert.CertificateException

Parameters:

Throws:
java.security.cert.CertificateException - if there is a problem with the provided certificate.

CustomSSLConnectionParams

public CustomSSLConnectionParams(java.io.File certificate,
                                 boolean noVerify)
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                 java.security.cert.CertificateException
Create a custom SSL configuration with a client certificate and optional peer verification.

Parameters:
certificate - the client certificate as a File object.
noVerify - switch to turn off peer verification.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the certificate provided could not be found.
java.security.cert.CertificateException - if there is a problem with the provided certificate.
